dcterms:description: A novel dataset consisting of 2,177 human gaits annotated with perceived emotions along with thousands of synthetic gaits generated using a generative network called STEP-Gen.
dcterms:title: E-Gait

dcterms:description: A mocap database that provides gait data used in the E-Gait dataset, consisting of gaits collected from various participants.
dcterms:title: Edinburgh Locomotion MOCAP Database
